comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Charlotte Vetter Gulick (1865-1938) and her husband Dr. Luther Halsey Gulick (1865-1918) founded the Campfire Girls in 1910: pointsoflight.org/programs/recognition/extra-mile/luther-... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luther_Gulick_(physician)

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This picture is clearly from the same session as the preceding one, in front of a modern building, but here she is placed in a painted forest background. Note she is holding the fire-making machine she is demonstrating in And here is another Bain LOC photo, not yet on Flickr, that shows more of that Gulick fire-making magic, and looks to be from the same session:

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and artolog:  Thanks for the additional information connecting Gulick and the Campfire girls.  We will update this and the related images with your information next time we update.
